import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {TextField, Button, Typography, Paper} from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyles from './stylesForm'; function Form() { const [postData, setPostData] = useState({ creator:'', title:'', details:'', deadline:'', tags:'', selectedFile:'' //this is for the image which will be converted to a base64 string }) const classes = useStyles(); const handleSubmit = () =>{ } return (
Creating a post setPostData({...postData, creator: e.target.value})} /> setPostData({...postData, title: e.target.value})} /> setPostData({...postData, details: e.target.value})} /> setPostData({...postData, tags: e.target.value})} /> setPostData({...postData, deadline: e.target.value})} />
) } export default Form;
